trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the table payload format for requests against any table accessed with this <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.CloudTableClient</codeEntityReference> object.
trans-unit.target: Gets and sets the table payload format for requests against any table accessed with this <codeEntityReference>T:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.CloudTableClient</codeEntityReference> object.

trans-unit.source: By default, this property is set to <codeEntityReference>F:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TablePayloadFormat.Json</codeEntityReference> for .NET and Windows Phone.
trans-unit.target: By default, this property is set to <codeEntityReference>F:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TablePayloadFormat.Json</codeEntityReference> for .NET and Windows Phone.

trans-unit.source: For Windows Runtime, it is set to <codeEntityReference>F:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TablePayloadFormat.AtomPub</codeEntityReference>.
trans-unit.target: For Windows Runtime, it is set to <codeEntityReference>F:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TablePayloadFormat.AtomPub</codeEntityReference>.
